segments.text: Excuse me . May I take a picture of you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I just want to show my children how an American policeman looks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . But I hope it won't take too long .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , no , it won't . Just stand there , please .
segments.speaker: S1
